name: FirstLetterLastLetter
0:
”Alexa, open First Letter Last Letter”
”Alexa, start timer”
”Alexa, new category”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: first letter last letter
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A fun game to play with friends and family.

A great way to learn new words in a fun way!

How the game works:

Select a category, if you want, the skill can generate a random one.

The first player starts off by saying a word in the category, within the 10-second timer. Then the next person says another word in the category, but there is a catch, every new word must start with the last letter of the previous word. If the timer is reached without a correct word being said, that player loses a point.

Play until you run out of words or want to change the category.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
